title: ICE: DepNode Hir(btrs[5509]::metainfo[0]::torrent[0]::Torrent[0]::source[0]) should have been pre-allocated but wasn't

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
Rust version: 1.40.0
Platform: Ubuntu 18.04

```
error: internal compiler error: src/librustc/dep_graph/graph.rs:680: DepNode Hir(btrs[5509]::metainfo[0]::torrent[0]::Torrent[0]::source[0]) should have been pre-allocated but wasn't.
```
